description.en:
Hachikō was a Japanese dog remembered for his remarkable loyalty to his owner, Hidesaburō Ueno, for whom he continued to wait for over nine years following Ueno's death.

HACHIKO INU is a 100% decentralized community experiment. 1/2 the tokens have been sent to Vitalik Buterin and the other half were locked to a Uniswap pool and the keys burned. Liquidity has also been locked on Unicrypt.
